product_name: Delta Cycle Tintoretto 2 Bike Tension Storage Rack
long_description: With a strong, simple design, the Delta Cycle Tintoretto 2 Bike Tension storage rack offers a great solution to store two of your bikes and clear up floor space. Strong 1.5 in. diameter pole has a tension adjuster that makes it easy to install in rooms with ceilings 7 ft. 6 in. - 9 ft. 6 in. high. Coated arms cradle your bike's frame while protecting the bike's finish; arms can be adjusted up and down, as well as around pole, for custom support. Maximum load of 154 lbs. (69.8 kgs) of evenly distributed weight.
short_description: With a strong, simple design, the Delta Cycle Tintoretto 2 Bike Tension storage rack offers a great solution to store two of your bikes and clear up floor space.
